item.description:
We're meeting again at the conference room at the Johnson & Wales Academic Center, for a free-form discussion this time.

The building is at the corner of Mathewson and Westminster streets downtown, across from the Hotel Providence. Parking is on the street, so if you're not familiar with the area or think you might run into trouble, email me. I'll give you my cell phone number to call for suggestions.

Please RSVP, and we'll see you there. Until then, happy coding.
item.name: Providence PHP Meetup May Meetup
